name: Dhoom:3 Jet Speed
description:
From the makers of Sultan: The Game and FAN: The Game, now play the sequel to THE OFFICIAL GAME FOR THE BLOCKBUSTER OF 2013 STARRING AAMIR KHAN - DHOOM:3 BY YASH RAJ FILMS PVT. LTD.

After a thrilling high speed bike race through the streets of Chicago in Dhoom:3 The Game, that saw over 12+ Million Downloads Worldwide, the chase continues on the Chicago river in Dhoom:3 Jet Speed, the second game in the series for Dhoom fans!

Ride a high power Aqua Jet through the Chicago river as Dhoom:3 movie anti-hero Sahir, as you evade ACP Jai Dixit, Ali and the ever determined Cops. Watch out for traffic and obstacles that litter the gorgeous water on the River and kick it up a notch with powerful Power-Ups to gain an edge over your pursuers. With simple Tilt/Tap controls and 3 Exciting Racing Modes, enjoy hours of fun filled action in this 3D endless racing game – Dhoom:3 Jet Speed.

DHOOM:3 JET SPEED FEATURES: 
* 3 Fast Paced racing modes – aim for the highest score in Endless Mode, beat a friend in Challenge Mode and race against the clock in Escape Mode
* Beautifully simulated water and stunning visuals for an experience like no other
* Responsive Accelerometer and Tap Controls to zip and zoom around obstacles
* Upgrade your Aqua Jets to make them more durable and survive collisions better
* Race up the Leaderboards on Game Center and show everyone you are the master of your destiny
* Action getting too fast? Use the Brakes to slow things down a bit

This is the Official Game for all the fans of Dhoom Franchise i.e Dhoom, Dhoom 2 and Dhoom 3 !

All set to Dhoom again in 2014? Learn more at http://www.99games.in/dhoom3jetspeed
Watch the Trailer - http://youtu.be/yPFqbdfkBu4
'Like' us on http://www.facebook.com/dhoom3thegame 
'Follow' us at http://www.twitter.com/Dhoom3TheGame

Hungry for more action? Download the award winning bike racing game - ‘Dhoom:3 The Game’ for FREE - https://itunes.apple.com/app/dhoom-3-the-game/id669921934

All Intellectual Property in Dhoom:3 and its characters, trademarks, associated artwork and designs are exclusively owned by Yash Raj Films Pvt. Ltd. © 2015 All Rights Reserved. All Intellectual Property in Dhoom:3 Jet Speed software are exclusively owned by 99Games Online Pvt. Ltd. © 2015 All Rights Reserved.

NOTE -
Dhoom:3 Jet Speed is Free-to-Play, but users can purchase additional 'Coins' and ‘Gems’ in the game using In-App Purchases. Dhoom:3 Jet Speed is currently not optimised for the iPod touch (4th Generation & Lower) and iPhone 4.
